name: Blue Ferret Communications
tag_list: copywriter, editing, case-studies, content, web-copywriting, content-marketing, seo, content-creation, email-marketing, online-newsletters, white-papers
overview:
Blue Ferret Communications is a freelance copywriting service, offering Web content creation and editing.

Chris Williams, its owner, focuses on B2B technology companies and related industries. He has written for software developers, industrial manufacturers, corporate training firms and more in the past 7 years.

Blue Ferret creates and edits only “Clear Content” - web content that’s easy to read. Written without corporate-speak. Jargon-free. And compelling to the reader. After all, we respond best to another human voice, don’t we?

Chris specializes in writing website content, case studies, white papers and email marketing.

Blue Ferret Communications is located in the San Francisco Bay Area. However they welcome clients from outside California.
